title: when i open lol it says that help please
body:
Can someone help me with this i try to run the game so i press launch and this comes up
C:Riot Games/League of legends/libssl-11.dll is either not intended to drive in windows or also contains a error try to install the program again with help of they original installation files or contact system administrator or  program supplier to get help error status 0xc0000020  

Someone Please Help Me!

replies.body:
Help is here!  It seems like your security settings might be blocking your game files from running and installing correctly.  I recommend running through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is being allowed.  

Once completed, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a force repatch and fix up any snags with game files.
